title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-contained LLM runner with a REST & CLI API that lets you pull, run, and chat with 50+ open-source models locally.
highlights: pull and run Llama-3, Mistral, Gemma...

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; install with pip install ollama and chat with local models in two lines.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; npm install ollama gives fetch-based chat, generate, embeddings.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package; exposes Ollama LLM & embeddings components for LangChain apps.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-web/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style); docker run -p 3000:8080 for instant local chat.

title: ollama-cli (sammcj/ollama-cli)
summary: Enhanced interactive CLI wrapper with history, syntax highlighting, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-rag (ggerganov/ollama-rag)
summary: Lightweight RAG example that embeds docs with Ollama and answers questions via llama-index.

title: ollama-copilot (github-copilot-ollama)
summary: VS-Code extension that routes GitHub Copilot calls to a local Ollama model instead of OpenAI.

title: ollama-helm (helm-ollama)
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU & autoscaling support.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration; use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama4j (ollama-java)
summary: Java/JVM client for Ollama with Kotlin extensions; Maven Central artifact.

title: ollama-curl (curl-ollama)
summary: Collection of copy-paste curl snippets showing every Ollama REST endpoint.

title: ollama-docker (official)
summary: Official Docker image and compose samples (CPU & GPU) maintained by Ollama team.

title: ollama-rust (ollama-rs)
summary: Async Rust crate exposing typed APIs for chat, generate, embeddings; crates.io: ollama-rs.

title: ollama-csharp (ollama-sharp)
summary: .NET client library for Ollama with async enumerable streaming; NuGet: OllamaSharp.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord.py bot that lets a server chat with local Ollama models via slash commands.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app that answers DMs and mentions using an Ollama backend.

title: ollama-obsidian (obsidian-ollama)
summary: Obsidian plugin to summarize notes, brainstorm, or Q&A using a local Ollama model.

title: ollama-rag-chatbot (streamlit)
summary: Streamlit UI that ingests PDFs, embeds via Ollama, and chats with retrieval; runs fully local.

title: ollama-nix (nix-ollama)
summary: Nix derivation to build and run Ollama declaratively on NixOS with GPU drivers.
